==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Wooden Club
|desc_1 = The Hilichurl Fighter's Wooden Club is a {{Wood}} object. It can be ignited and slowly burned away using {{Pyro}}.
|file_1 = Hilichurl Fighter Burning Club

|name_2 = Hit
|file_2 = Hilichurl Fighter Smack
|desc_2 = Swings its club at the player once, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3 = Jump and Hit
|desc_3 = Charges and swings its club at the player powerfully, dealing '''200% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and knocking the player back.

|name_4 = Swing That Club
|desc_4 = Performs 3 consecutive swings at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''', '''100% ATK''', '''125% ATK''' with each swing as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_5 = Punch
|desc_5 = Approaches and swings its fist at the player, dealing '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used if the Hilichurl Fighter's club is destroyed.
|file_5 = Hilichurl Punch

|name_6 = Rock Throw
|desc_6 = Digs a small rock out of the ground and throws it at the player, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used if the Hilichurl Fighter's club is destroyed.
|file_6 = Hilichurl Rock Throw
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.<br>Ill-tempered warriors for their tribes, they are simple-minded believers in the power of brute force. If their muscles grow strong enough and their strength great enough, then one day they too shall raise up a great shield and become a [[mitachurl]]... Or will they?|[[Archive]]}}
